00039 class VEventHandler {
00040 public:
00041         enum eMouseButton { eLeft, eMiddle, eRight, eWheel };
00042 
00043         VEventHandler() : mbFullScreen(false) { }
00044         ~VEventHandler() { }
00045 
00046         // input handlers
00047         virtual bool HandleKey(int key) { return false; }       
00048         virtual void MouseMotion(int x, int y) { }
00049         virtual void MouseWheelRollUp() { }
00050         virtual void MouseWheelRollDown() { }
00051         virtual void MouseClick(eMouseButton) { }
00052         virtual void MouseUnclick(eMouseButton) { }
00053 
00054         // event handlers
00055         virtual void SetWindowSize(int width, int height, bool fullScreen);
00056 
00057         int                     mWindowWidth;
00058         int                     mWindowHeight;
00059         bool            mbFullScreen;
00060 };
00061 
00062 class VMain : public VEventHandler {
00063 public:
00064         VMain() { }
00065         virtual ~VMain() { }
00066 
00067         // run the main application
00068         virtual void Update(float dt) = 0;
00069 
00070         // window utility functions
00071         virtual void ClearWindow() = 0;
00072         virtual void SetWindowName(char* pName) { mName.assign(pName); }
00073 
00074 protected:
00075         std::string     mName;
00076 };

00092                         void    ConvertWindowCoordsToOrthoGL(float wX, float wY, float& x, float& y);
